title: Princess Charlotte or Katie Holmes: What's your cardigan style tribe?
text:
We’re at a point in time where, when it comes to cardigans, you’re either a Princess Charlotte or a Katie Holmes. You may not know what I mean by this, so allow me to recap: Princess Charlotte’s first day of school was the ideal opportunity for her to cement her status as the queen of sweet and proper fashion. I know she’s only four, but did you see how her school cardie was neatly buttoned all the way up with a perfect little Peter Pan collar poking out from the top? For some, that’s pure cardigan goals.

Elsewhere, an artfully dishevelled Katie Holmes was chanelling much more of a class-rebel vibe. Hailing a cab in New York, she exhibited the perfect modern grunge concoction in the form of a...
description: We’re at a point in time where, when it comes to cardigans, you’re either a Princess Charlotte or a Katie Holmes.
